name: Threshold (itch)
description:
Threshold is a beautifully hand-painted puzzle platforming game where you play as the cute little gnomish wizard, Hood, who needs to find their way through a series of mysterious doorways. All is not as it seems, however, as depending on which direction Hood faces, the world changes to present different challenges.

Threshold is currently in development. We are currently looking for funding to help us continue developing the game. Our current plan is to work on the game when we can, using what funds we can gain from sales here on Itch.io to help fuel our development costs. A Steam Early Access release is also in the works. Itch.io buyers will get Steam keys.
